name: 3dECM
author: AFNI Team
description: Performs degree centrality on a dataset using a given maskfile via the 3dECM command

inputs.name: Autoclip
inputs.description: Clip off low-intensity regions in the dataset.

inputs.name: Automask
inputs.description: Mask the dataset to target brain-only voxels.

inputs.name: Eps
inputs.description: Sets the stopping criterion for the power iteration; :math:`l2\|v_\text{old} - v_\text{new}\| < eps\|v_\text{old}\|`; default = 0.001.

inputs.name: Fecm
inputs.description: Fast centrality method; substantial speed increase but cannot accommodate thresholding; automatically selected if -thresh or -sparsity are not set.

inputs.name: Full
inputs.description: Full power method; enables thresholding; automatically selected if -thresh or -sparsity are set.

inputs.name: Mask
inputs.description: Mask file to mask input data.

inputs.name: Max iter
inputs.description: Sets the maximum number of iterations to use in the power iteration; default = 1000.

inputs.name: Memory
inputs.description: Limit memory consumption on system by setting the amount of gb to limit the algorithm to; default = 2gb.

inputs.name: Scale
inputs.description: Scale correlation coefficients in similarity matrix to after shifting, x >= 0.0; default = 1.0 for -full, 0.5 for -fecm.

inputs.name: Shift
inputs.description: Shift correlation coefficients in similarity matrix to enforce non-negativity, s >= 0.0; default = 0.0 for -full, 1.0 for -fecm.

inputs.name: Sparsity
inputs.description: Only take the top percent of connections.

inputs.name: Thresh
inputs.description: Threshold to exclude connections where corr <= thresh.
